Mayor

Carol K. McCutcheon

Council Member McCutcheon was elected to her third term as Single Member District 4 in 2021. She and her husband, Joe, have lived in Sugar Land since 1993. Council Member McCutcheon is known for her civic and community involvement, and has extensive experience as a reservoir engineer in the exploration and production of oil and gas.

June 2025 - May 2028
